dict.acceptation: 它；他；正好是所需的；事实[情况]；
<美俚>傻瓜，笨蛋；<俚>绝妙的人；理想的东西；登峰造极；

sent.orig: It will be a federal standard, but it will be widely implemented in the IT community.
sent.trans: 它将是一项联邦标准，但它将在IT界广泛实施。

sent.orig: IT department: It'stands for Information Technology.
Certification gives an IT a credential that is recognized in the IT industry.
sent.trans: 证书，为IT行业提供了一项专门的、在IT业含金量很高的认证。

sent.orig: This dynamic is changing the IT industry and the scope of IT careers.
sent.trans: 这一动态将改变IT行业以及IT的职业范围。

sent.orig: Warren-to break the IT bubble, IT did not take train-is to spit in their champagne.
sent.trans: 沃伦——这个打破IT泡沫、没搭乘IT列车的人——正在往他们的香槟里吐口水。
